channel.title: xml2 on Ethan Brockmann
channel.description: Recent content in xml2 on Ethan Brockmann

item.title: Parsing XML with ~~`xml2`~~ `tidyr`
item.description: This post was typed on an iPhone, so please forgive any typos!! # devtools::install_github("tidyverse/dplyr") library(xml2) # I though you said we weren't using xml2... suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyr)) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr)) library(tibble) library(gt) ratee <- tempfile(fileext = ".xml") download.file( "https://raw.github.com/ArctiCondor/edgexml/master/XML XSD/DDC_RATEE_XSD_XML_083019/RATransferElementsExtract.xml", destfile = ratee ) tbl_ratee <- read_xml(ratee) %>% xml2::as_list() %>% as_tibble() %>% unnest_wider(raTransferReport) tbl_ratee %>% gt() html { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', Arial, sans-serif; } #gmwuuogdnh .
